ats_resume.title: ATS Resume Expert Pro
ats_resume.desc: Leveraging **Google Gemini AI**, this tool automates resume optimization. Ideal for **GenAI Product** enthusiasts.

interior_design.title: AI Virtual Interior Designer
interior_design.desc: Combines creative **Generative AI** with computer vision to visualize spaces. Great for **Visual AI** lovers.

polyglot.title: Polyglot AI – Language Detection System
polyglot.desc: A classical **NLP** model capable of detecting languages with high precision. Perfect for **Core ML** interest.

flight_fare.title: Real-Time Flight Fare Prediction Application
flight_fare.desc: A pure **Data Science** project achieving 96% accuracy using advanced regression. Perfect for **ML Engineers**.

crop_yield.title: Crop Yield Prediction Model
crop_yield.desc: Utilizes **Neural Networks** to optimize agricultural output. Ideal for interest in **Deep Learning Applications**.

clearview.title: ClearView – Interactive Air Quality Insights
clearview.desc: Focuses on **Data Visualization** and real-time environmental insights using PowerBI and Python.

smart_feedback.title: Smart Feedback Collection and Analysis System
smart_feedback.desc: A scalable **Full-Stack** solution featuring real-time analysis and complex architecture. For **Backend** fans.

cloudcast.title: Cloudcast - Advanced Weather Application
cloudcast.desc: A polished **Frontend** application with dynamic glassmorphism UI. Demonstrates strong **UX/UI** skills.

mlops.title: Vehicle Insurance MLOps Pipeline
mlops.desc: End-to-end **MLOps Pipeline** with CI/CD and Cloud deployment. The definitive project for **Cloud/DevOps**.
